short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reminds you of people who supported the Iraq War.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A lot of people really supported the Iraq War in 2003 and don't really want to talk about it for whatever reason. This plugin will help remind you that some people made a disastrous decision and have faced zero consequences for it.
